content.detailedDescription: Out on patio happened to look up and it was traveleing fast thought at first it was a ballon or some sort of blimp but it was super shiny and moving very fast dissappeared within 2-4 minutes from eyesight . it also had no sound and the way it traveled was not all over the place. i have never seen anything like this before , i can tell the difference it it were ballons but way too big and looked like it was changing color . it looked teardrop shaped
content.summary: It was brown and silver looked like 2 balloons stacked on each other.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,i try to spend a few hours at night with my telescope when we get clear nights in glasgow. i use a pair of 10x42 binoculars for spotting and generally looking at the heavens, but i normally just lay on the garden table and use my eyes to look at the constellations as my night vision is really good after 20 minutes. i have seen many ufos, but they're always so fleeting that i question what i saw after the fact -- was it a satellite, comet, meteor or other space debris burning out in our atmosphere? but not on monday morning. i saw a perfect cube appear right before my eyes! i was looking at zubeneschamali, which is the beta star in libra, when the cube just came out of nowhere! speechless, i quickly spotted it with the binoculars, through which i saw a brilliant perfect cube with an illuminated border. it was moving too quickly, so i knew i could not track it with my telescope. i just watched it with my binoculars. it changed colour from blue to aqua-green and stopped cold. i ran inside to grab my digital camera and managed to take one picture as it moved away and as soon as i took one picture it accelerated backwards to the point it appeared and it was gone. i waited for an hour just incase it came back, but it didn't.

i have zoomed into image progressively, the camera resolution does not match the human eye but you can see the outline and shape.

it is at the top of the tree moving from right to left, the libra star is on the top right of the tree. the cube was much sharper and brighter than this image, i have no idea how large it was or how fast it was moving, it was a brilliant experience.

people have told me it was a satellite but know satellites have a very smooth consistent speed and direction, satellite do not just appear in the sky at a single spot, then progressively drift, speed up, slow down and stop, they definitely do not change colour and noway can they change direction, if anything in the sky can reverse directing at sharp angles "instantly" its a fair to say its not man made, the force on the object would rip it apart. watching this ufo was akin to the ball in the computer game pong, but it was square. i have a decent pair of binoculars, (helios am6) these are not astronomy models but they have very good optics for the money, i could see the back ground of space around the outside of the square, the inside of the square was pure blackness compared to the illuminated boarder so it seemed to be a solid object.

i could not use the telephoto on my camera for a few reasons, the main one is blur as most camera uses know about. the second one is light, the further out you zoom the less light enters the lens, if i had zoomed out i would have ended up with a very dim streak of light because of hand shake. thirdly my zoom is motorized and uses a spot meter to focus, the chances of zooming out into a dark infinity and having the camera pull focus on a faint distant object are very very bad, plus i only managed single picture before it decided to bounced backwards and vanish. i just had a feeling it could go at any moment and it did, typical! i never use the lcd for taking pictures, only the optical view finder. i only use the lcd screen for checking the exposure and iris and general camera settings, so i actual saw it in the small view finder on the camera as well, thankfully the camera has a fast start up time or i would have taken a picture of an almost empty sky.

i searched online for pictures of any square ufo but found nothing similar to what i saw, but i found a story in the highlands news paper about a woman who saw a square ufo in her back garden, this story is only a month or so old, i have no idea if its related to what i saw.

here is the link


http://www.Highland-news.Co.Uk/news/fullstory.Php/aid/5508/widow_s_ufo_shock.Html

i don't know what else i can add but i hope its of some use to somebody.

thanks for your time.

ali
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: An illuminated square with picture.
Orange light hovered for 10 minutes approx. a half mile away.

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work on sat. may 2nd, noticed a very bright shiney light, it was a clear blue sky day. as i continued to observe the object i noticed that it wasn't any convential type of aircraft (because for the first minute or so that was what i was trying to identify it as). then upon closer viewing notice it was rotating from top to bottom. it was apprx. 10-15k in altitude and about a quarter inch in size from my extended arm.
content.summary: Metallic round, doughnut (center open), spinning from top to bottom.

content.detailedDescription: This picture was sent to me by a friend. she saw this and sent it to me. she said look at the angel in the sky. i looked at the picture closer and i can see a metallic shiny object to the left at about 11 oclock.
content.summary: Shiny object next to cloud aberration.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with my dogs just about sundown. the sun had just gone below the horizon but the sky was still very bright with some high level haze or thin cloud cover. as usual i was watching the sky just looking for birds, airplanes, etc. we live under one of the approach paths for sat airport and we have a lot of civilian and military traffic.I saw what at first i thought was a buzzard but then i noticed i couldn't see any wings and it was not circling as they usually do. the object was totally black with no reflection from the sun and was moving in a straight line to the northwest at a steady pace. it was moving at about the speed of a normal civilian airliner as viewed at normal flight altitude. it did not deviate at all in altitude or direction. all of a sudden it occurred to me that this thing was not normal. i thought about grabbing my camera, but i realized that by the time it powered up the object would be gone over the horizon so i grabbed my binoculars instead. i got them focused on the object just before it disappeared over the horizon.The object was solid black with no light reflection and did not appear to be below the haze or cloud cover. it looked like a cube made up of large black balls. i would have thought it might be some kind of balloon except that it was a perfect cube and the surface looked more like just half of balls arranged to form a cube. i really can't judge the sized due nothing else being close to it in the sky. i've never seen anything like this before. maybe it was some type of balloon but due to it's constant speed, direction, and altitude i doubt it. right now i consider it to be a true unidentified flying object. the attached jpg file is a simulation of what i saw. the object is not at correct scale.
content.summary: Black cube moving nw by sat airport.

content.detailedDescription:
Trying to find out if og&e had a power surge.
i live less than 1 mile from a power station.  
sometimes hear the buzzing of the station in my home.

could have been many things, including fatigue, but the events follow typical ufo encounters.

1) went to bed about 2235 l
2) about 2300l i saw a light outside my bedroom window traveling the permiter of the window in an rectangular pattern.
3) after about 30 seconds i saw a small light gray circular domed disk travel through the room in which i was sleeping.
4) the object entered the room at the corner of the window.
5) the object was about 8-12 inches in diameter.
6) the object was not illuminated.
7) the object was a light gray color as if it were covered with a cloak.
8) the object traveled through the air about 7 feet from the floor.
9) there was a louder humming noise when the object was in the room.
10) the object was in the room about 10-15 seconds.
11) there was no physical contact and no voice sounds.

i have a very logical mind, my career profession used to be scheduling aircraft for an airline. this morning i had trouble with the lights on my modem for internet connection.  strictly a light problem all systems are operating properly.

there could be other explanations for this, but i have encountered this same experience on at least one other occasion at this location.

if this was a ufo encounter, i suspect that power stations are what they are targeting. possibly due to a power drain or power failure somewhere in their internal operating system.

will be happy to speak with someone about this if they want more information.  i've only experienced possible ufo sightings less than 5 times in 60 years.  i do not drink or drug. i am a female 60 years of age.
content.summary: Bright light outside, small domed circular disk seen inside house. light gray.

content.detailedDescription: I really don't know how to think about this let alone write about it...  my girl friend and i went out to the garden for a smoke, looking up i saw what i thought was a satellite passing over head, i ran inside and got my laser pointer to point it out to my girlfriend. we followed it as it traversed the sky south north it then seemed to fade away, only to reappear but this time it would pulse (maybe 20 times brighter) then disappear, reappear again, pulse and disappear again. this continued maybe 8 or 9 times. as strange as this was it is not why i felt the need tell someone. just as it disappeared i looked up and saw something moving across the sky east/west, i still can't comprehend what i saw or what it was i think my brain is finding it hard to process it. the best way to describe it is to say that a part of the sky was moving, or at the very least something that blended in to the sky was, i know that doesn't make sense but my girlfriend was also was there and we are still trying to accept and comprehend what we saw. i then pointed the laser pointer so that i could keep track/focus on it as it was hard to follow, i was completely shocked when right off the bat the laser hit it or i should say it dispersed across its surface spreading out and very bright. the next shock was the realization that it was a lot closer than i had originally thought and absolutely dead silent. the only way for me to describe it would be to say i could not see a definitive shape because it was, to use a sci-fi term, cloaked! do we have this type of technology? i'm still trying to grasp what happened and still feel the shock from the laser hitting it and how bright it became. it was like sensing something in a dark corner you shine a light to find there is nothing there only this time there is.
content.summary: Cloaked flying object.

content.detailedDescription:
i was laying in bed when i noticed a light shining in my two windiws one facing west and one  south the light was like a fog it was fogging in you could see decent pattern's , at first i thuoght it was a police helocopter so i jumped up out of bed  and looked out the west window and observed a light  emiting object with no sound when i herd no sound i knew i was in trouble , the light went off so i backed up from the window about three feet and it came back on so i stopped and freaked and said did you see that and she said yes , and it went off for a second and i ran down the hall into the other room where my sister was sleeping and tried to wake her up and could not arouse her and the light came back on blasting in ,i backed up again , and in a moment the light went off so i was angry and ,ran outside out front under a tree and no light was observed , paused  for a second and ran to the side where i saw the object on the west side  of the house and looked up in a partley clouded sky and saw a exiting light fade out gone i looked up just in time to see this happen  this vehicle was using this light as a means of propluion , the way the light fade happened could only mean interdementional travel means i say this  because i saw it happen just at thr right time.
sincerley
john bozant.
content.summary: White light/blue tint fogging in and decending like a helicopter, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside enjoying the full moon,,and the quiet....While sitting in my chair i noticed it was a very clear night...Not a cloud in the sky.. even though it cloudy all day.....I leaned back in the chair..And as i looked up in the sky this boomerang shape cloud just appeared out of nowhere....Out of this cloud something flew out very slowly at first..And then sped up toward madison ...This cloud was very dim.And took about 5 minutes to disappear...It never lost shape ..But got smaller in size till it was gone....I see lots of strange things over this river!!!!!
content.summary: Boomerang cloud forms in sky.....Object slowly flies out of cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I am a contractor in south eastern pa and was on my way to ny for a job.  i was traveling east on the pa turnpike.  around 4:30 am in sept. i noticed what appeared to be a shooting star in front and to the left of my car about 2 miles away.  it just appeared about 500 feet off of the ground and shot straight down into the woods and disappeared.  it was not like any shooting star i have seen and i have seen many, the way it came out of nowhere and then  into the woods was very odd.  my first thought after i saw it was holy crap i think i just saw a ufo?!  i was pretty freaked out to say the least.  it was a little east of morgantown pa, which has plenty of woods around if anyone is familiar with it.  maybe it was a shooting star, but i have never seen anything like that before.
content.summary: Looked very close to a shooting star but did not display the same characteristics.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my residence at 9457 las vegas blvd in the middle of the street and i looked up into the night sky and saw this triangle shaped object which was much bigger than any plane, blimp, kite, it was huge and it was made up of hundreds of rectangle like objects that looked metallic and were not connected togeather at all just free floating but which togeather made a triangle shape. it was just sitting there suspended in the air and if not for the lights from the nearby casino, the south coast casino i probably would not even have seen it as it had no lights of its own. i watched it until it just kind of disappeared out of sight. i was not on any kind of drug, alcohol, or any thing and i consider myself to be of very sound mind. i've always said that until i see one i will not believe it and i definitely saw this and i know that it was a ufo.
content.summary: I saw what appeared to be rectangular objects unattached forming a triangle hovering above the las vegas strip with no lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a construction worker building a waste water treatment plant in vonore tennessee. the morning this happened i  was preparing a 16 foot tall,concrete form for a pour that afternoon. we are on the edge of tellico lake and are accustom to seeing bald eagles, osprey and other birds flying over the job site. i heard several sandhill cranes calling overhead and began looking for them. at this time i saw what i thought was 9 cranes very high overhead, maybe, this is a guess, 10000ft, there was an airliner above them producing a comtrail probably 30 to 35000ft. 
 the object were silver in appearance and moving up and down heading south. at this time i thought they were very high cranes because i could still hear the cranes calling. then i saw the real crane circling to land at the lake, i continued watching the 9 objects which were flying paralle to me still making a slight up and down motion. at this time formation turn north coming directly over my head, this is when i realized these ojects were not birds, because when they made the turn they were in perfect formation, 3 rows of 3. after watching for maybe one minute these things blinked out as if you turned out a light. it blew my mind. i have not told a soul about this and have no reason too, everyone around here would think i needed a rest at the funny farm but i felt this needed to be reported to someone. thanks for your time!
content.summary: 3 rows of 3 oval vehicles in formation.

content.detailedDescription: A couple friends and i were at another friend's house watching a basketball game on tv. we left at 10:50 p.M. and one friend drove three of us home. as we were driving on the freeway, i jokingly pointed to an object in the sky and said that it was a ufo. this was at about 11 p.M. that got everyone's attention and we had no idea what it actually was. one friend dismissed it as a radio tower because of how low it seemed. it also seemed to be hovering over a certain area. he then realized there were no radio towers in the town we live in. once i saw that it was moving, my heart began to race. we were all in shock at what we were seeing. it had three visible flashing lights, all three of them different colors. it resembled a jet, but was moving to slow and completely silent. we quickly pulled into a parking lot to get a better look but it vanished behind some trees. thinking we had seen all there was to see, we dropped off two of the friends. minutes later, as i was being taken home, we saw it again. this time it was moving toward us. we quickly drove down a sparse yet usually busy road for a place to park. we parked the car and turned the lights off. at this time, we could see the bottom of the object. it was massive; about the size of an apartment building. it seemed to be so close to us yet it didn't make even the slightest noise. we watched it fly slowly into the distance until we lost site of it. i know all the flight patterns of commercial airlines around here and this object was on a course of its own. it was also ten times bigger than any jet i've ever seen. i was stunned by this experience and also very happy that i got to witness something so rare. after i got home, i did a bit of research and found a video on youtube of the same thing that i saw. http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=n99dmrmrc-8&feature=channel_page. i had a much better view than what is seen in this person's video. i am kicking myself for not recording it on my phone but i was way too caught up in the moment to even think about it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very large flashing object.

content.detailedDescription:
What really made me sit up and look at the sky was the blazing speed of what could have been a silvery pointed vehicle--if it was a plane, it was faster than any normal planes.  the "con" trail was also unusual. this vehicle would "spurt" pieces of con trail....Then no con trail would appear for 3/4 seconds.  again, a con trail would appear, just one power source from what i could see, more con-trail and then nothing again.  this happened across the horizon in a matter of seconds.  not a commercial plane for sure.  as the vehicle was zipping by across lake michigan, it just blanked out--no more con-trail--no more pointed type vehicle.

i'd guess the compass course would have been about 220 degrees, not quite straight west--a notch to the south.

amazing speed could have been some type of ram-jet, "if it was a military vehicle.

ben mocini
grandville, mich.
content.summary: A "very" fast  "puffy bursts from i could see @ 40k feet--moving from east to west--20 degrees south.

content.detailedDescription: I were going to sleep and i saw through the window was something like a flying cigar , 2 times in the building garden was illuminate with light a that came from the cigar  that only was there 1 second and the cigar go up and dissapear and the airplane that followed them take another rute .
content.summary: I feel when it pass near by i fall and some airplane start to followed an the cigar dissapeared in only seconds.

content.detailedDescription: On a fairly warm and pleasant summer august evening, i drove out of my parking lot,, heading east, when i noticed a very bizarre display, about 100 feet up in the sky, off to my left, above a tennis training facility and television station. eight, small, round lights, were moving in a circular, clockwise formation, joing into a center mass at the completion of the circle, then breaking out into eight round lights, again, from the center and repeating the display, endlessly. i got out of the car near the tennis facility, and stood on the sidewalk watching this formation, wondering what i was observing. i had first thought it was some sort of searchlight or advertising gimmick from somewhere in town. i went into the tennis facility, but no one knew anything about the lights, and would not go out to speculate. whereupon, i got back in my car, and headed one block west to a convenience food mart. i asked the male, teenage clerk to come out and look at the display, which he did. when i asked him what he thought he was looking at he said he had no idea.  i, then, went back home and called up the television station. i asked if there was any special searchlights or advertising targeting the area. they said, none that they knew of, and would not go out and look, as they were deep in preparation for the 10 pm newcast. i called other stations and no one knew of any promotions that would explain this display. the display continued, endlessly, as i had to leave the area for a work assignment. there was nothing in the newspapers or radio/television media the following day to explain what this might have been.
content.summary: Very bizarre display of eight small orbs regularly circling in a clockwise formation, then coalescing into a center large mass, breaking apart, and  continuously repeating the display.

content.detailedDescription: Driving a regular babysittter home, around the corner and down the road from my residence,(on an extremely cold and clear night),  we both noticed these two huge, parallel,white circles, about ten feet above a maple tree, near a ranch-style house. having traveled the road nightly, i questioned "what in the world" they were, since we both had never seen such a display. no sound emanated from them either. the teenager said it must be an airplane; however, no airplane perches ten feet above a tree, without any sound. as we turned left in front of the tree, the lights passed over my automobile and shot straight out into the night sky! when i returned to my residence, i immediately called dr. j. allen hynek of the center for ufo studies in evanston, illinois. i had taken an astronomy course from him while an undergraduate at northwestern university. he answered the call, himself, took down all the relevant information, and replied that he had many other calls of the same nature from the farther south suburb of carol stream. to this day, as that night long ago in january of 1976, i feel incredulous, and wary that i experienced  such phenomena.
content.summary: Two huge, silent, parallel, white, stationery circles, ten feet above a  maple tree on a residential suburban road.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately at 11:40 pm i awoke from about an hours sleep. i went out on front porch to smoke a cigarette.  the sky was pitch black and clear, you can see all stars clearly, not a cloud in the sky.  i looked up to look at stars when i noticed what i thought was a falling star but it looked like it was going up and it was the same size as the stars with a fire like color to it.  then out of nowhere before i could blink my eye there are these 3 triangle shape things just right above the tree lines kind of like gliding over the sky.  they were too small to be a plane they were moving way too slow for a plane. they were flying in a diagonal formation and they didn't even make a single sound.  the only thing i heard were crickets.They were in the sky for about one minute then they just disappeared.  these objects were orangish white that almost seemed to be see thru.  i have never in my life seen anything like it.  i called the local police, they advised me to call the airport which i did, no military planes that night.  i called the nws in jackson, ms..No weather ballons at that time of night.  i was also advided to call the air nat'l guard in pearl ms. who refered me to security which i did, they advised no military planes.  they also told me my conversation was being recored which was fine with me.  i just got the internet today.  i don't want folks to thing i'm crazy but i know what i saw and it was nothing i have ever experienced before. while i was watching them i wasn't scared it was almost peacful but the next day i was a nervous wreck.
content.summary: 3 distinct triangular shapes with orangish white glow.

content.detailedDescription:
El pasado dia 3 de mayo estando en el mercadillo de la nucia, nos sobrevol��� un objeto de forma extra���a, un cilindro con 2 bolas de color gris metalizado, avanz��� y ascendi��� en direcci���n hacia benidorm, aumentando la velocidad progresivamente hasta pararse durante unos minutos, fu��� en ese momento cuando realiz��� una foto con el tel���fono m���vil. al tratar la fotograf���a con la escala de grises se aprecia m���s detalles y forma, incluso una especie de antena en el lado derecho. 

last may 3 being in the street market of the nucia, we were overflown by an object of strange form, a cylinder with 2 balls of gray metallized color, advanced and ascended in direction(address) towards benidorm, increasing the speed progressively up to stopping during a few minutes, were in this moment when realiz��� a photo with the mobile telephone. on having treated the photography with the scale of gray, it appreciates more details and forms(trains), even a species(kind) of antenna in the right(straight) side.
content.summary: 1 cylinder with 2 spheres.

content.detailedDescription:
I have lived near the top gun base in fallon all of my life 
so i have become used too seeing wierd lights in the sky but this was totally different from anything i've ever seen my girfriend and i were returning from the desert when we saw 3 strange aircraft flying together eradically in a triangle formation they stopped at once and one of the ufo's fell in a slow motion to the ground as if it had crashed the other to seperated and flew south west we followed them untill one of them was parrallel to the truck i was going 35mph and so was the craft i sped up to 50mph and so did the craft it shadowed me untill i drove to a dead end in an attempt to follow the other one when i reached the dead end the craft that had been parrallel to us flew over the top of us twice then sort of drifted back the way it came then hovered maybe 200-300 yards away my girlfriend plug in my 3 million candle power spotlight in to see if i could make contact with the seemingly translucent craft i cover the lense until i was sure to be aimed at the craft as i uncovered the light it was close enough that the light reflected off of it so we put the spotlight away the craft swooped in like an airplane would banking untill it was facing us with five super bright white-orange lights it stayed and hovered at less than 100 yards away for about ten minutes this is when we first heard the craft it was so quiet almost silent there was only a slight hum then it flew off and back going over us twice then hovering again it seemed as if it was playing with us which pretty much rules out the millitary in my opinion it hovered for maybe another ten min as the other circled behind us almost like back up to make sure we werent hostile then the first craft turned hard to the left makin the crafts light shift from five lights to 1 light then as it turned it became completely invisible only to reappear over highway 50 revealing many little yellow lights then shifted back to five lights in stayed parrallel with me on the highway untill i got closer to the lights of town when it pulled up behind me and hovered for maybe a minute as i got closer to town they flew back to where the dead end was my girlfriend and i were pretty shaken after seeing this and i had my dad and my brother go with me back to where we had originally seen the craft we saw one of them but much farther away this time at first we thought that this was just an airplane but more light became visible on it three in the front it stopped and hovered for about half an hour when we were out there we noticed a truck with a spotlight looking for something when we stopped to look for the aircraft the truck killed all his lights as we were leaving we saw a black suv with tinted windows driving toward the trucks location we also saw a hellicopter spotlighting the ground (we think looking for the third craft)and people in nearby fields with spotlights
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: As i was driving home from the desert i saw a boomerang shaped aircraft with 5 lights on the front.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were driving around the desert. we had been out there a while, and soon it got very dark. we were driving back on our way home, when we both saw 3 objects in the distance, with lights we had never seen before, and flying in a unusual way, in a group. we got very excited while watching, and suddenly they started breaking away from eachother. one started going down towards the ground and dissapeared like it had crashed. the other two continued to fly, almost towards us.
we decided to chase them! we started after them, and they flew right by us many times. one specifically seemed to keep coming back to us. we tried to comfirm it as a military aircraft, but it was nothing either of us had seen before. we thought maybe it could be a drone, but the more we looked we knew it wasnt. at first there was 3 flying objects, but by this time there was only 2. but only one seemed to awknowlage us. we parked the truck after watching it fly by us and over us several times. it was completely silent. and hovered slowly, although in the distance it went faster. i decided to plug the spotlight in and try and get its attention. it worked! we were parked on a dirt road, next to a water canel. across from the canel was a small passture, the hovering craft flew directly at us, and stopped facing us. we shined the light at it, and put our hand over the light to make it strobe. the craft sat there for a good 5 mins, and seemed like it was getting closer, so close it was alomst as if we could throw something at it. and there was no sound. i tried to get pictures but, the pixel rate on my cam phone was too low and came up as all black on the screen. we started to get scared and jumped back in the truck, as soon as we did the craft moved and went behind us as if it was following us. the other craft was in the distance as if it was watching, sort of like back up.
my boyfriend and i both called our parents freaking out, and not knowing how to explain the events that were going on. we watched them fly around us consistantly. but when we reached the highway, and back on our way into town, they dissapeared. when we made it back into town to my house, i was stadning outside, and seen a c 130 fly over our heads. i knew this wasnt the craft i seen because it was too large, was too high up, and wasnt silent. i could also see the shape of it and it was obviously a plane.
but these hovering crafts we seen were black, almost invisable except for the lights. when they turned you couldnt see them. the only time they were all visible was when they were facing you, and that because of the 5 alined lights.
i went inside my house and drew a picture for my father, he called the naval base here in fallon. they told us they had no reports of any aircraft besides the c 130. but i knew it wasnt a c 130!

my boyfriend and his father went back out to where we were. when they got there, there were helicopters with spotlights on the ground, several trucks with spotlights driving through the desert. a black suv with very dark tented windows driving towards the area we seen the crafts. men walking around with spot lights in the desert. as if they were all looking for someting.
but if they were looking for the craft that we thought we seen crash, they were in the wrong area, they were looking where we had first seen the crafts from a distance. miles off.

im not sure what i saw tonight, but ive always been a believer of other life forms. and tonight was proof for me. i was scared..And excited. i hope i find out more about what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Boomerang shaped, black, hovering aircraft. 5 lights facing you, invisible turned away.

content.detailedDescription:
Early wedearly wednesday morning, while sleeping on the couch of my friend, alex pisarch, i awoke sometime after 1am to the sound of my phone's text message ringtone. i then spent the next hour and a half texting a female friend of mine until we both desided to goto sleep. around 3am, while laying on the couch, i noticed what i thought was the brightest star i have ever seen shining through the window. after looking at the light for about 3 seconds, it disappeared to the right behind the tree line and i said to myself, "oh, it was just an airplane." a few moments later, i noticed it come back into view, from the right to the left. i sat up and said, "what the hell, airplanes dont change their directions like that" and went to the window. i watched it wobble in the air in the same place for a few minutes then decided to go outside for a better view.

once outside, i witnessed the object move left then right and up and down at various speeds. i felt dumbstruck. i didn't know if i was just crazy or this was really happening, so i decide to wake someone in the house for backup.

my first choice was to alert my friend alex, but i noticed his twin sister averil had her door open and the tv was on. i checked if she was awake and luckily she was. i convinced her to come outside with me to witness the event. she and i both watch the object move erratically for around an hour. the only thing i could possibly think it was would be a balloon, because most of the time it just stayed stationary, but the brightness of the object and the at random times very rapid movement ruled that out, we was slightly frightened but very intrigued. this was something neither of us had ever seen. we then decided to wake alex and averil's boyfriend jeff. by the time everyone as assembled outside, it had stopped moving rapidly, and pretty much settled where it was going to be. it only moving slightly up down left and right. after a few minutes we all went inside to search for binoculars. when we went outside the object was gone.

it's important to say that this took place from 3am to a little after 5am and during that time, the object trekked from slightly below the treeline while laying down inside to very high in the sky that could only be viewed while outside. it was much brighter than any star and moved like no man made object. and this was a clear night. we do live near keesler air force base, but it was not near it.

alex and averil said they could both see pulsating lights under the main bright light, but i could not.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright light in the sky for an extended time moving erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on gates in redondo beach, about to turn into my driveway when i spotted something very strange in the dusk western sky. it looked like a large horizontal vapor trail that didn't vaporize.  it hung in the air for a short time and then started moving south. at times it looked like the lowering sun reflecting off of a much bigger object, as if i was just seeing a small corner of a stealth hidden blimp or other plane. 

i called my brother, who lives a little further south and he went outside to look. his view was blocked, so he went inside and up stairs and confirmed that he, too saw something strange. he asked me to go get my camera, and i did. when i back came outside, the object had "shortened" in length and was now moving north. i was able to get some pretty bad footage of this. right then, my brother said he saw something else in the north west sky. sure enough, there was an orange ball with a vapor trail that seemed to be hanging in the air. i was able to get some bad footage of this too before the sky cleared.

this could just be a plane and a meteor, but we would like to confirm if others say the same strange things.  the uploaded footage is small, i have larger sized footage.
content.summary: West over manhattan beach, california (90266) saw horizontal short vapor trail move south and then stop and move north. second object spotted in north west sky - orange fire ball that hung in air.

content.detailedDescription: I awoke with my girlfriend to a loud electrical type sound (kind of like the electrical bolts on the old frankenstein movies..But a much lower frequency) i got out of bed and looked through my blinds and seen a globe of light across the water at least half a mile away. a beam of light then focused on us,so it seemed  so i closed my blinds and the blanket the covers them, and the light just went right through.(this was weird because the blanket is there to block out all light and had no effect)the light was bright and lit up the entire room unlike any light i have ever seen before, it was brighter than daytime.We then got very scared and turned on the tv and internet to see if it was like an emergency or something.Nothing  abnormal  was on. we went  back to bed and didn't talk about the event much  and i tried to reassure  my girlfriend  that everything was all right. i was very scared and had many thoughts on what it was. i didn't write down the date or time...I searched the internet and newspaper sure it was going to be flooded by reports but never seen any matching my encounter. i let time get away from me and lost the time in witch it happened . i asked some  friends and they  made me feel crazy. this was very real and i am surprised i have never seen a similar report. i don't want fame  or money i just want to know if anyone else  reported this. this event kind of  eats away at me  because i know it was real. was it a government  thing or alien i don't know that. i sometime lay awake in bed waiting for it to happen again..And  i will take  action this time. there are so many things i wanted to do but was too scared at the time. i tried to find other sites to report to but i  wanted to find a creditable one first. i am almost scared that i missed my only oppurtunity to see such a thing. then again,maybe getting out of the light was the best thing to do ..Who knows?
content.summary: Ball of light.

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i were driving to big bend national park on vacation. we were about 50 miles south of marathon, tx on 385 heading south. it was a clear day, and we were both well rested and excited about our trip. i was gazing out the window at the mountains and the desert terrain. we had to be doing about 85 mph. i was in the passenger seat. i noticed out of the corner of my eye soemthing extremely bright and moving fast toward the car. i saw what looked like a teardrop shaped head for lack of better words with a thin line of what appeard to be a shiny band of silver wrapped around the center. i thought i saw what looked like a figure in a running man pose supporting the teardrop head, but i couldn't be absolute becaus the entire thing was engulfed in an undescriable white light, and was follwed by light tracers. i don't know if the figure or thing moved through the vehicle but as quickly as i saw the thing the cab of the suv was filled with the light. the vehicle moved in an upward circular motion but never left the ground kind. the light exited the vehicle on the driver side. i saw my partner who was driving look at me. he was pale white and dioriented, and he said to me "what are we doing?". i said, "i dont know." and that was it. a few things:#1. the raio was playing in the car quite loud, however when the light moved through the vehicle there was no noise, not even the sound of the car on the road. #2 when the light was in the vehicle, it was all you could see. no definition to anything, just white light. after it was over i did not see spots liek one normally would after being exposed to uv lights. #3 my partner was driving the whole time, and never lost control. #4 it was not cloudy, it was broad daylight. #5 there were no other cars in sight.#6 there were no bumps or dips in the road to excuse the motion of the vehicle.#7 no dust devils in sight before or after.#8 the vehicle was not damaged in any manner.#9 we were completey sober.#10 we had the same experience with sligth detail differences. #11 we were paniced right after it occured, but shortly after we were very giddy.#12 we didn't discuss it much after the vacation was over, however when we got home, everytime we discussed it together we would get extreme anxiety. when we discussed it seperatley with our friends we were okay.
content.summary: Desert encounter with bright object/figure/light while in vehicle broad daylight highway 385 around marathon, tx.

content.detailedDescription:
on sunday april 26, 2009 at approxamatly 2:00 am, not able to sleep, i went outside on my deck to have a cigarette.  it was a beautifull, warm and clear night. no clouds, just stars. 
  while having my smoke and as by habit, my eyes were drawn to the night sky. whenever i'm outside, day or night, i continually watch the sky in anticipation of such incidents as the one about to be described.
  what i wittnessed was a round, defined, white ball or oval object cross
the sky above me at a straight trijectory and high rate of speed (took 4 seconds)before it dissapeared.  the object had no tail, it did not fly in an arc and its shape was a clearly, well focused ball with no haze or aura around it.
  at first i thought the object to be a shooting star, but, i've seen shooting stars and noticed they usually have a tail and fly at an arc.
this object flew straight and had no tail. there was no sound niether.
  the object flew rapidly to a point it could no longer be seen as opposed to simply vanishing. it's pattern of flight appeared deliberate.
  i was amazed at its "crystal" defined, clarity.
its size was indeterminate. my view at ground level, suggested the object
to be 1 inch in diameter so in relation to the altitude from the ground to the sky i suspect the object to be quite sizable.
  i was very excited to have seen this. as i've expressed earlier, i am facinated by such activaty and i'm always looking up at the sky in the hope of captureing more incidents such as this.
  this event happened in conover, nc in the county of catawba in the springhaven subdivision.

submitted by:
gregg pepitone
may 6, 2009
content.summary: Noticed what appeared as white round ball cross the night sky at high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home at about 9:00 pm around the second week in april of this year,2009. grissom afb is close by so i am used to seeing aircraft. never in my life have i seen anything in the sky like i witnessed that night. when i seen it i said aloud, neat! while driving i noticed a single white strobing light, which is normal. all the sudden about six to eight horizonal lights in a row appeared in a straight line where the strobing light was. then it dissapeared. is there some new aircraft never before seen is the sky?
content.summary: Horizontal lights.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were driving down to iowa city, iowa.  we were heading south on interstate 380 and up in the clouds in front of us we saw a big green ball of light.  it was definitely moving, and very large.  it had a tail on it, much like a comet.  when i first saw it, my first thought was that it looked just like a comet, but then i remembered how close it was to earth.  it only lasted about 5 seconds, and then it was completely gone.  it disappeared just as fast as it showed up.  i definitely got the chills after i saw it, it was very very strange.
content.summary: Big ball of light up in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed lots of fighter style jets all going towards one area in the sky. that is when i got a couple of the pictures, i was just trying to get all the jets into one pic, there were probably 6 or more. i think my pictures only show a couple though. i have 9 pictures in all!

only seen a flash in the sky, never seen the craft or whatever it was until i was able to study the still images.
content.summary: Jets chasing ufo in nv.
